item.title: OCaml Weekly News, 04 Jun 2024
item.description:
1. v0.17 release of Jane Street packages
  2. jsonschema2atd, Generate an ATD file from a JSON Schema / OpenAPI document
  3. opam-repository policy change: checksums (no md5) and no extra-files
  4. Camlkit -- macOS/iOS/GNUstep toolkit for OCaml
  5. position for MoonBit advocate
  6. Why is there no tradition of CLI and TUI apps?
  7. Ppxlib dev meetings
  8. Yojson 2.2.0
  9. Grace 0.2.0 ðŸ’…, fancy diagnostics library for compilers
  10. First release of Slipshow on opam!
  11. Other OCaml News
